nodes.text: Odynnia Gavo was a terrestrial world. By 35 ABY, during the war between the First Order and the Resistance, Odynnia Gavo was one of the worlds not under First Order control. As such, the world was a contested site where General Bellava Parnadee of the First Order directed ground forces.
Odynnia Gavo was first mentioned in the 2019 reference book Star Wars: The Rise of Skywalker: The Visual Dictionary, written by Pablo Hidalgo.
